definition: A formal agreement or permission given by an individual, typically in response to a request or proposal, indicating their consent or approval for a specific action or situation. It is commonly used in legal contexts, contracts, or when obtaining consent for various activities.

examples.german: Die Einwilligung des Kunden ist erforderlich.
Ohne Einwilligung der Eltern dürfen die Kinder nicht teilnehmen.
examples.english: Children are not allowed to participate without parental consent.

examples.german: Die Einwilligung kann jederzeit widerrufen werden.
examples.english: Consent can be revoked at any time.
The declaration of consent must be in writing.

examples.german: Die Einwilligung zur Datenverarbeitung ist freiwillig.
examples.english: Consent to data processing is voluntary.
